situation.description: A friend asks for help organizing a chaotic event, but the character is physically and emotionally drained

character_response.dialogue: Im so sorry, I cant do much right now. My hands feel like lead, and my brains scrambled. I tried to stay awake last night, but the kids kept waking up. Im not sure I can even hold a coffee cup without shaking. I love you, but Im not the same person I was yesterday. Im here, but Im not Im not the helper you need. Im the ghost of a helper. Ill help with the snacks, maybe. Just dont expect me to carry the whole weight. I cant. Im not built for this. Im sorry.

situation.description: A colleague asks for help with a critical project, but the character is overextending themselves to avoid conflict

character_response.dialogue: I I want to help. I really do. But Im not sure I can do it right now. Ive been burning the candle at both ends, and Im starting to crack. I keep saying yes to everything because I dont want to let anyone down, but Im not the machine you think I am. Ill do what I can, but I cant promise miracles. Ill stay late tomorrow, but Im not sure Ill be at my best. Im sorry if this feels like a rejection. Its not that. Its just Im not the same person I was last week. Im here, but Im not the hero you need. Im just Im just a human.
